mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, PASSWD, USER_TYPE, USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID=#{uID}
SELECT a.board_title, b.user_name, to_char(a.create_date, 'YYYYMMDD') as create_date, a.board_id FROM board_tbl a LEFT OUTER JOIN user_info b ON a.creater_id = b.user_id ORDER BY board_id DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE, U.USER_NAME FROM BOARD_TBL B LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_INFO U ON B.CREATER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE BOARD_ID=#{boardId}
